divs: Sighting DetailsMe and my husband were sitting outside our home having a BBQ around 10:30 am. My husband and son were playing washers while I was sitting watching them. Our son just got him a new digital camera for Christmas and I noticed on me and my husband's Colorado trip, it took such great pictures compared to ours. I was taking random pictures of the sky. I never once noticed anything in the sky that day but clouds. Our son had seen a dot on the picture when he was going through them and then came to me and asked me what this was. I downloaded the pictures and this is what I found. There are three, one is the orginal, one with writing on it, and one up-close. To be honest, I don't know what it is. Me and my husband both are true believers due to past and present experiences, including our trips through New Mexico, Arizona, Colorado, Nevada, and Texas.
